1251.content: What happens in your adventure of Lucifer?
1251.title: What happens?

12511.content: Where do you end up being shrunk at?
12511.title: Shrunk where?

125111.content:
The club it is! Now, who are you?

Sarah: Simple, skinny blonde haired girl at the age of 25. It's your birthday and you got enough birthday money to go to Lux, which you always wanted to do.

Lilly: A small, young little girl at the age of 8. You end up lost and seperated from your mother, seeing big glowing letters that may have friendly people inside!
125111.title: Who are you?

choices: Start calling to the dancing people.
Look around for someone who was standing still, hopefully they won't step on you
1251112.content:
You and your mother were walking back home, it wasn't that late but being winter, it got dark quick. You followed behind her, a little wary of the dark beyond the cars and streetlights. Suddenly though as the two of you passed under yet another streetlight, you began to feel dizzy, falling behind as your mother kept walking, unaware of what was happening to you.

You tried calling out to her, but by the time you could, your voice was so quiet she couldn't hear. Rubbing your eyes to try and see again, you look around and realise you have shrunk! You were just about two to three inches tall!

It didn't take long for you to start panicking, between being tiny and your mother nowhere in sight. You looked around for her but instead you saw a big sky scaper building a block ahead with three bright letters on it, a L, a U and a X. Curious and hoping maybe they could help, you make your way towards the door.

Once inside, you almost regretted it, people were everywhere, dancing away to some music, bright lights flashed around and you were almost stepped on numerous times! How were you going to get help in here?
1251112.title: Lilly

1253.content: A few years have passed: What TV show are you trying to survive in this time?
1253.title: New decade, new shows

choices: jump onto an oblivious Clementine's dress
12531.content:
It has taken years of climbing the executive ladder, acquiring millions of funds and influence, but you are finally among the rich and powerful, and with the access to the Delos Corporation's playground of the elite.

Guests such as yourself are free to do as they wish with the hosts, whether this means joining in on the narratives or indulging in their more carnal desires. Thanks to the park's anti-squishing technology, the giant hosts are incapable of causing harm to the small, wealthy guests who want an adventure of a lifetime.

After the miniaturization process, your adventure begins on a platform outside of the Mariposa Saloon. You look up in awe as the giants cross down the road, oblivious to the loading zone where you can get off to enter the humongous building. Their huge boots crash onto the dirt, sending clouds of dust.

Thank God for that anti-squishing fail safe! you think to yourself. Now, how about some well earned fun? You have a map of the whole park as well as the names of certain hosts (characters) highlighted to activate their quests.

A massive silhouette is above the loading platform, you recognize her instantly. This could be a great first quest to get accustomed to the park...
12531.title: Welcome to Westworld
